responses.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Project retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": {{urlParam 'id'}},
    "name": "Solar Farm Alpha",
    "description": "Large scale solar installation with advanced monitoring systems",
    "status": "In Progress",
    "progress": 65,
    "startDate": "2024-01-15",

    "capacity": 500,
    "budget": 2500000,
    "actualCost": 1625000,
    "assignedTeam": "Team A",
    "phases": [
      {

      },

      },
      {

}
